translations: n.基里姆地毯（产于土尔其，高加索及其附近地区）；绣织地毯，花毯

phrs.translation: 基里姆地毯, 基里姆, 框架简介, 开发环境配置
基里姆地毯, 克里姆地毯
吉林河, 该洞在靠近吉林河
地质公园, 兰卡威地质公园

sentences.sentence: You'll note that this type doesn't require any special Kilim code.
sentences.translation: 您会注意到这个类型不需要任何特殊的Kilim代码。

sentences.sentence: I am shown to a two-bed cave with kilim carpets on the floor – and mercifully stationary beds.
sentences.translation: 有人带我看了有两张床的山洞，地上铺着东方的织花地毯，谢天谢地，是固定床位。

sentences.sentence: Methods containing the Pausable throws clause are processed at runtime by a scheduler, which is part of the Kilim library.
sentences.translation: 包含 Pausable throws 字句的方法在运行时由一个调度程序处理，该调度程序包含在 Kilim 库中。
